argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cycsubgcyg2.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | cycsubgcyg2.k | |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` G ) = ( .g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4, 2 | #P_cycsubg2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. B ) -> ( K ` { A } ) = ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. B ) -> ( G |`s ( K ` { A } ) ) = ( G |`s ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) = ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 7 | #P_cycsubgcyg | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. B ) -> ( G |`s ran ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n ( .g ` G ) A ) ) ) e. CycGrp ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. B ) -> ( G |`s ( K ` { A } ) ) e. CycGrp ) |
